name: sbgoldbb
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wral(s0, ceven, wi(wbr(nat4, clt, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cgbe))), wral(s0, ceven, wi(wbr(nat2, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cprime, wrex(s2, cprime, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2))))))))
